title: Give yourself the green light
brief_description: Demonstrates the inadequacy of roads in the United States and illustrates measures to improve roads and relieve traffic congestion; municipal parking lots; express ways through crowded cities; cross-country super-highways; cloverleaf’s in various section of the country; cities and States matching federal grants for road construction and maintenance.
